<?php

namespace App\Http\Controllers\Main;

use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;
use App\Models\PetugasKebersihan;
use Illuminate\Http\Request;

class PetugasKebersihanController extends Controller
{
    /**
     * Display a listing of the resource.
     */
    public function index()
    {
        $data['title'] = 'Data OB';
        $user = PetugasKebersihan::all();
        $data['result'] = $user->sortDesc();
        return view('main.petugas_kebersihan.index', $data);
    }

    /**
     * Show the form for creating a new resource.
     */
    public function create()
    {
        $data['title'] = "Tambah Data OB";
        return view("main.petugas_kebersihan.create", $data);
    }

    /**
     * Store a newly created resource in storage.
     */
    public function store(Request $request)
    {
        $validasi = $this->validate(
            $request,
            [
                'nama' => 'required',
                'nomor_telp' => 'required',
            ],
            [
                'nama.required' => 'nama OB tidak boleh kosong',
                'nomor_telp.required' => 'nomor_telp produk tidak boleh kosong',

            ]
        );

        $produk = PetugasKebersihan::create([
            'nama' => $request->nama,
            'nomor_telp' => $request->nomor_telp, // Simpan gambar di direktori storage/app/public/images
        ]);

        return redirect('main/petugas_kebersihan')->with('success', 'Data berhasil disimpan!');
    }

    /**
     * Display the specified resource.
     */
    public function show($id)
    {
        $row = PetugasKebersihan::findOrFail($id);
        return view('main.petugas_kebersihan.show', [
            'title' => 'Detail Data OB',
            'nama' => $row->nama,
            'nomor_telp' => $row->nomor_telp,
        ]);
    }

    /**
     * Show the form for editing the specified resource.
     */
    public function edit(Request $request, $id)
    {

        $row = PetugasKebersihan::findOrFail($id);

        return view('main.petugas_kebersihan.edit', [
            'title' => 'Edit Data OB',
            'id' => $row->id,
            'nama' => $row->nama,
            'nomor_telp' => $row->nomor_telp,
        ]);
    }

    /**
     * Update the specified resource in storage.
     */
    public function update(Request $request, string $id)
    {
        // Ambil data produk berdasarkan ID
        $row = PetugasKebersihan::find($id);
        if ($row) {
            $row->nama = $request->nama;
            $row->nomor_telp = $request->nomor_telp;


            // Simpan perubahan
            $row->save();

            return redirect('main/petugas_kebersihan')->with('success', 'Data berhasil diubah');
        }
    }

    /**
     * Remove the specified resource from storage.
     */
    public function destroy(string $id)
    {
        $user = PetugasKebersihan::findOrFail($id);
        $user->delete();
        return back()->with('hapus', 'Data sudah di Hapus!');
    }
}
